longBusinessSummary: Diamines and Chemicals Limited engages in the manufacture and marketing of organic chemical compounds in India. It operates in two segments, Speciality Chemicals; and Trading in Fruits and Vegetables. The company's products include piperazine anhydrous, ethylenediamine, diethylenetriamine, aminoethylpiperazine, triethylenetetramine, tetraethylenepentamine, polyethylene polyamine-mix, monoethanol amine, triethylenediamine, and amine mixture, as well as piperazine derivatives. Diamines and Chemicals Limited was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Vadodara, India.
